page.title: 10GLADSTONE PARK SURVEY NW10
page.content:
This was conducted by 17 3rd Yr pupils of Gladstone Park J.M.School July 1985 { POLL = 100 AGE RANGE = 8-70 { FEMALE = 54 MALE = 46 {Use of park Total Female Male Regular visitors 95% 52% 42% Formal gardens 45% 29% 16% Playground 32% 20% 12% Football pitches 25% 3% 22% Tennis courts 24% 12% 12% Swimming pool 21% 11% 10% { What people like about the park? Open space 27% Rural atmosphere 18%
{ What people dislike most? Dog mess 85% Danger at night 5%
{ Suggested Improvements Dog area 80% Cafe 12% More seets 11%
FOR MORE DETAILS OF GLADSTONE PARK SEE PREVIOUS PAGE
